lead_paragraph: The United States ambassador to the United Nations, Samantha Power, scheduled a Security Council meeting on Monday to address what she called “these dangerous launches.”

headline.print_headline: U.S. Calls for Security Council Action on Iran’s ‘Provocative’ Missile Tests
headline.main: U.S. Rebukes Iran Over Missile Tests, Calling Them Provocative

snippet: The United States ambassador to the United Nations, Samantha Power, scheduled a Security Council meeting on Monday to address what she called “these dangerous launches.”
abstract: Samantha Power, American ambassador to United Nations, rebukes Iran over series of ballistic missile tests; schedules UN Security Council meeting on matter; dispute threatens to impede mending relations between United States and Iran following nuclear agreement.
